00011 class SockBuf : public std::streambuf, public BaseSocket {
00012 public:
00013     static const int BUFSIZE = BUFSIZ;
00014 
00015     inline SockBuf() { _initBuf(); }
00017     inline SockBuf(const Socket &s) : BaseSocket(s) { _initBuf(); }
00019     inline explicit SockBuf(type t, protocol prot=ipproto_ip) : BaseSocket(t, prot) { _initBuf(); } 
00021     inline SockBuf(int sd) : BaseSocket(sd) { _initBuf(); }
00022     
00024     void close();
00026     ~SockBuf();
00027 
00028     using BaseSocket::shutdown;
00029 
00030 protected:
00031     virtual int overflow(int c = EOF);
00032     virtual int underflow();
00033     virtual int sync();
00034 
00035 private:
00036     char _inBuf[BUFSIZE], _outBuf[BUFSIZE];
00037     
00038     void _initBuf();
00039 };    
00040 
00042 class SockStream : public std::iostream {
00043 public:
00044     SockStream() : std::iostream(new SockBuf())
00045     {
00046         exceptions(badbit);
00047         free = true;
00048     }
00050     explicit SockStream(SockBuf &s) : std::iostream(&s)
00051     {
00052         exceptions(badbit);
00053         free = false;
00054     }
00056     explicit SockStream(const Socket &s) : std::iostream(new SockBuf(s))
00057     {
00058         exceptions(badbit);
00059         free = true;
00060     }
00062     explicit SockStream(type t, protocol prot=ipproto_ip) : std::iostream(new SockBuf(t,prot))
00063     {
00064         exceptions(badbit);
00065         free = true;
00066     }
00067  
00069     inline SockBuf* sockbuf() const { return (SockBuf *)rdbuf(); }
00071     inline SockBuf* operator->() { return sockbuf(); }
00072 
00073     ~SockStream() { if(free) delete sockbuf(); }
00074 
00075 private:
00076     bool free;
00077 };

00080 std::ostream &crlf (std::ostream &s)
00081 {
00082     return s << "\r\n";
00083 }
